0.1.name: Beta 0.1
features: Initial Beta Release

0.2.name: Beta 0.2
features: Moved more stuff over to scripts.json to make the extension more dynamic
Added limit checking to settings variables when starting a script
Added logging to GUI without needing to open the browser inspector
Prettier UX/UI
Fixed some translation inconsistencies

0.3.name: Beta 0.3
features: Fixed error checking on input boxes
Updated some resources

0.4.name: Beta 0.4
features: Rebranded to TeamsTools
Always "See More" - get rid of the "See More" button
Better Dark Mode - if you don't want to blind yourself
Remove annoyances - remove bloat/annoying features
New style
Added support for the https://teams.live.com alternative URL
Bugfixes & Tweaks
Offline mode if the servers are down
Cleaner code

0.4.1.name: Beta 0.4.1
features: Fixed camera staying turned on during an autojoin (thanks @Bot-Rakshit)
Fixed error screen and it's context menu not being correctly "darkmoded"
Fixed extension not loading due to it not being able to find the page's header on some instances
Added the "Download the desktop app banner" to the list of annoyances
